bell_schedule.1: School starts at 8:30 AM, Recess is from 10:15 to 10:35 a.m., Lunch is from 12:00 to 12:45 p.m. Grades K to 3 are dismissed at 2:40 PM and grades 4 and 5 are dismissed at 3:05 PM
bell_schedule.2: Tuesday is early release day. School starts at 8:30 AM, Recess is from 10:15 to 10:35 a.m., Lunch is from 12:00 to 12:45 p.m. Grades K to 3 are dismissed at 1:42 PM and grades 4 and 5 are dismissed at 2 PM
